benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/paymentMethods - Retrieve account payment methods

covered: Valid Request: Happy path and all documented query parameters (withPluginInfo, includedDeleted, pluginProperty, audit) including combined usage are exercised.
Empty Response: Scenarios validate behavior when the account has no payment methods.
Path Parameter Validation: Invalid UUID returns 400 and non-existent account returns 404.
Query Parameters: Positive and negative coverage (invalid audit value, unknown extra parameter, multi-value pluginProperty) is present.
Security/Hardening: SQL injection and XSS attempts are handled with appropriate errors.
Resilience and Error Handling: Service/plugin outages (502/503), network timeouts, and recovery via retry are tested.
Performance: Large dataset response time is validated.
Backward Compatibility/Integration: Previous contract compatibility and plugin service dependency behavior are covered.
gaps: Pagination: No scenarios validating pagination or explicitly confirming it is unsupported for this endpoint.
Caching Behavior: No validation of ETag/Last-Modified or Cache-Control headers, nor conditional GET behavior.
Rate Limiting/Throttling: No tests for 429 or server behavior under burst traffic.
Authorization Variants: Only missing-token 401 is tested; no coverage for authenticated-but-forbidden (403) or expired/insufficient-scope tokens.
Content Negotiation/Headers: No explicit checks for Content-Type application/json and Accept header handling.
Schema Validation: No rigorous validation of the PaymentMethod, pluginInfo, and audit object schemas and required fields.
Input Validation Edge Cases: No tests for non-boolean values for withPluginInfo/includedDeleted, or excessively long/invalid pluginProperty formats; no explicit audit=NONE scenario.
Business Semantics Gaps: No assertion on ordering or determinism of returned payment methods; no case where only deleted methods exist with includedDeleted=false.
recommendations: Add pagination-focused tests or, if unsupported, a scenario explicitly asserting the absence of pagination controls and that the full set is returned.
Introduce caching tests: verify ETag/Last-Modified and Cache-Control on 200, and conditional requests (If-None-Match/If-Modified-Since) returning 304.
Create rate limiting scenarios to validate 429 and retry-after behavior under burst traffic.
Extend authorization coverage to include 403 (insufficient permissions/expired token) and role-based access cases.
Assert headers: check Content-Type application/json and respect of Accept header; also verify standard error response shape.
Add schema assertions for PaymentMethod/pluginInfo/audit (required fields, types, enums) rather than generic presence checks.

Expand input validation: invalid boolean values for withPluginInfo/includedDeleted, explicit audit=NONE, and pluginProperty format/length boundaries; clarify and assert the expected effect of pluginProperty values.
Add scenarios for deterministic ordering (if specified) and for accounts with only deleted methods when includedDeleted=false (should return empty set).
